meta-review.comment: Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door is one of those games that proves that RPGs can be both intelligent and utterly charming. The game's signature blend of turn-based combat, witty dialogue, and quirky characters make it a joy to play. The paper-crafted world is filled with delightful details and surprises, and the game's unique mechanics keep the gameplay fresh and engaging throughout. From paper transformations to stylish action commands, there's always something new to discover. Whether you're a seasoned RPG enthusiast or a casual gamer, this game is a must-play, offering a perfect balance of challenge and accessibility. The only downside? Once you start playing, you won't be able to put it down.
